parameters.name: isActive
parameters.description: Flag to filter maintenance to only return active items, i.e. maintenance that is happening right now.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the disruptions to be returned. If not present all types will be returned.

200.description: Successfully returned a list of disruptions

get.description: Returns information on a single disruption/maintenance/calamity.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Disruption type for the disruption to return.

200.description: Successfully returned a list of disruptions

get.description: Returns personal disruptions for the user of the NS-app based on the pushId

parameters.name: X-NS-Push-ID
parameters.description: The push id of the user

200.description: Successfully returned a list of disruptions

post.description: Sync saved trips from reiswijzer with the disruptions API

parameters.name: x-api-key
parameters.description: API key required to sync saved trips

isActive.title: isActive
isActive.description: Whether this item is active, i.e. it is currently happening. For example maintenance that starts in the future has this property set to false

topic.title: topic
topic.description: Topic to subscribe to in order to receive updates for this disruption.

title.title: title
title.description: Title of the disruption, containing the location(s) of the disruption

local.title: local
local.description: A local disruption has messages tailored towards a specific station.

titleSections.title: titleSections
titleSections.description: Title of the disruption which includes where the disruption takes place. For example: Utrecht - Gouda -Icon- Den Haag

end.title: end
end.description: End time of the disruption. May be left empty if unknown

period.title: period
period.description: Human-readable description of the period for this disruption

publicationSections.title: publicationSections
publicationSections.description:
Publication sections for these disruptions. Please note that these may be larger than the actual
track sections where the disruption is. This has to do with stations being recognizable for the customer.
For example, there could be a disruption between Utrecht Vaartse Rijn and Bunnik. In that case, the
trajectory could be Utrecht Centraal to Driebergen-Zeist, as most customers do not know where Utrecht Vaartse
Rijn and Bunnik are. In this case, the trajectory will contain Utrecht Centraal to Driebergen-Zeist, whereas
the disruptedTrackSection will contain Utrecht Vaartse Rijn to Bunnik

timespans.title: timespans
timespans.description: Distinguishable timespans within this disruption. Multiple timespans may occur for maintenance.

alternativeTransportTimespans.title: alternativeTransportTimespans
alternativeTransportTimespans.description: Distinguishable timespans for alternative transport within this disruption.

Impact.title: Impact
Impact.description: Impact of the disruption, from 0 to 5

description.title: ExpectedDuration.description
description.description: Human-readable description of the expected duration of the disruption.

endTime.title: ExpectedDuration.endTime
endTime.description: Expected end time for this disruption

end.title: TimeSpan.end
end.description: End time of this timespan. May be left empty if unknown

period.title: TimeSpan.period
period.description: Human-readable description of the period for this disruption

situation.title: TimeSpan.situation

label.title: TimeSpan.situation.label
label.description: "Human readable description of the situation caused by the disruption

situation.description: Information about the situation caused by the disruption

label.title: Cause.label
label.description: Human-readable description of the disruption cause

label.title: AdditionalTravelTime.label
label.description: Human-readable description of the additional travel time that is expected"

shortLabel.title: AdditionalTravelTime.shortLabel
shortLabel.description: Short human-readable description of the additional travel time that is expected

minimumDurationInMinutes.title: AdditionalTravelTime.minimumDurationInMinutes
minimumDurationInMinutes.description: Minimum expected additional travel time in minutes

maximumDurationInMinutes.title: AdditionalTravelTime.maximumDurationInMinutes
maximumDurationInMinutes.description: Maximum expected additional travel time in minutes

label.title: AlternativeTransportSummary.label
label.description: Human-readable description of the alternative transport that is available to the user

shortLabel.title: AlternativeTransportSummary.shortLabel
shortLabel.description: Short label indicating the alternative transport that is available to the user

uicCode.title: StationReference.uicCode
uicCode.description: Short UIC code for this station

stationCode.title: StationReference.stationCode
stationCode.description: Short station code (e.g. UT for Utrecht Centraal)

countryCode.title: StationReference.countryCode
countryCode.description:
Country code of the country that this station is in.

e.g. NL, D, B, F

location.title: AlternativeTransport.location
location.description: Gives more information about the location of the alternative transport

label.title: AlternativeTransport.label
label.description: Human-readable description of the alternative transport that is available to the user

shortLabel.title: AlternativeTransport.shortLabel
shortLabel.description: Short label indicating the alternative transport that is available to the user

description.title: Location.description
description.description: Human-readable description of the location of the alternative transport

isActive.title: isActive
isActive.description: Whether calamity item is active, i.e. it is currently happening. For example maintenance that starts in the future has this property set to false

topic.title: topic
topic.description: Topic to subscribe to in order to receive updates for this calamity.

lastUpdated.title: lastUpdated
lastUpdated.description: Moment that this calamity was last updated

expectedNextUpdate.title: expectedNextUpdate
expectedNextUpdate.description: Expected moment that this calamity will be updated

bodyItems.title: bodyItems
bodyItems.description: Body items to render when showing this calamity

url.title: url
url.description: URL for more information about this calamity
